name: memes
title: Level 4 Task
description:
Submit random meme image to <#977772192827863080>.
It should have at least 3 reactions from another members.

Submit your answer (copy link of the message) in following form:

`/lv4 memes <message_link>`

name: memes_react
title: Level 4 Task
description:
React to at least three meme messages in <#977772192827863080>.
Command can be used multiple times.
One link per submition.

Submit your answer (copy link of the message) in following form:

`/lv4 memes_react <message_link>`
